EmailTemplate.name: 202002_Americas_General_Military-Base-of-the-Future_Webinar.It's now On Demand -
EmailTemplate.subject: Military Base of the Future is now On-Demand
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Military Base of the Future Webinar The live webcast has already ended, but you can view it on-demand here <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/mfYfyyfsFfUiyMYaJfZRLu]]>! Please use code 654168.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more. Sign up here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>.
We look forward to seeing you next time!
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/mfYfyyfsFfUiyMYaJfZRLu]]>
